website_summaries.verdict: A practical, versatile option for protecting more than one tire when not in use, such as a set that you need to store during off season.
pros: A good choice for storing tires, as it comes in three sizes
Can cover a stack of four
Combination of zipper and drawstring closure does a good job keeping tires dry and free of debris
cons: Sizing is a big off – if in doubt, choosing a larger size may provide the best fit

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it to cover my winter wheels, which are stacked outside my shed. I had repeatedly tried covering the wheels with plastic held down by bungee cords, but they always managed to work free in a storm. This product is exactly as advertised, and after a few months exposure to the elements, there is no visible degradation from sun or water. The drawstring at the bottom keeps the cover on in 25+ mph winds. I wish it had a stiffener on top so that water doesn't collect and provide a breeding spot for mosquitoes, but I don't think it was designed for outdoor storage. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stevil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover!
customer_reviews.text: My winter tires (245/40r18 Conti DWS 06) were an inch too tall for the medium so I went with the large rather than risk it. It’s roomy but not too baggy at all and I’ll be able to use it in the future if I ever switch to an SUV or truck. The material is thick but also pretty soft. Good quality zipper and a drawstring at the bottom. Came with a nice storage bag too. In my opinion this would still be a solid purchase at twice the price. I definitely recommend this cover for indoors. I don’t think it’s intended for outdoors and probably wouldn’t hold up to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the tires clean and the bugs out
customer_reviews.text: Like many folks, I have winter tires and summer tires. I have to store whichever set's not in use under the deck. This cover keeps the the tires clean and helps prevent any critters from nesting in the stack of tires while they're stored under the deck. The drawstring around the bottom helps keep a good seal. In addition to the cover, I recommend putting the tires on top of a tarp or flattened plastic garbage bag so the tires are not resting directly on moist ground / dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: Medium is perfect fit for 235/40-18 tires
customer_reviews.text: Size medium was a perfect fit, both diameter and height for 4 tires (235/40-18") with wheels off of my Civic Sport. Measure the outside diameter of your tires. Mine measured almost exactly 25".
customer_reviews.author: DanL

customer_reviews.title: Has held up very well. Read review.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 18 months ago to cover my off-road tires when I wasn't using them. I bought a large and it snugly covers four 32" tires. Wheels are stored on a scrap chipboard panel so they're not touching the ground. On top is another scrap chipboard wrapped in a garbage bag. That's so water and leaves can't collect in the hollow. Over the top is this wheel cover and it all has sat out in the elements since day one. The grey faded some but that's it. Cord and material hasn't deteriorated at all.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great for those of us that have a spare set (or more) of wheels. Very well made and has room to cover wide tires.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tire hide / cover. Fits over my 20" wheels/tires with no problem and lots of room if I had larger tires. My overall diameter is 28.5" app. and w/ 275mm width the stack of tires is fairly high (imo). I paid a fair price and shipping was very quick. It's a high quality product and is worth every penny. Update..... Love these so much I bought enough for all my sets of wheels.... these are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: MYUSVET

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping snow tires clean over the summer months
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted to keep my snow tires clean in the garage until next winter. The first set I ordered were too small, returned and got the next size up, which is a bit too big but its okay. The material seems durable and the cover is well made. I like that I can wash it--a plus for sure. I gave it all 5 stars because it is all that I wanted. Not sure how well it would hold up outside but for me, its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: central new york

customer_reviews.title: Medium for 18x8 235/45/18 wheels
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Medium size to use with a set of 18x8 235/45/18 wheels and its a perfect fit. just enough room to easily get the cover over, but not a ton of slack. the material does not like to stretch, so i would be shocked if this size fit a tire larger than 18-19 inch wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely legit. The medium fit my 18” wheels on 215/40 perfectly. Tucked my wheels and tires away nice and neatly and safely while protecting them from the elements. Comes with a little bag which ended up being perfect for my extra lugs and will come in handy for storing the cover away too. This is what you need!!
customer_reviews.author: xTheHundredthx

customer_reviews.title: Durable, waterproof tire cover.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to store tires for my minivan, Subaru Outback, & sports sedan. I used an old plastic garbage lid on top of the tires to keep rainwater from pooling in the top. Seems pretty waterproof, and definitely UV protection of the tires. I live in a very windy place, and the cover stays on in 30+ mph winds.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not UV resistant!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just over a year ago to cover my tires. It is evidently not resistant to the sun, as it has started to disintegrate with rips and tears. Probably works fine for indoor storage but,if you store tires indoors, why would you need one of these? Strongly recommend that you not buy this for outdoor tire storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product...Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I did not purchase this product to store seasonal tires but to store my factory rims and tires. At first, I thought the product was going to be too small. But it fit all 4 of my 22in factory Truck rims with ease. My garage is cluttered free and my tires will be safe from spiders, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Get the large!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I ordered the large size, because it fit all 4 of my stock 18” Tesla Model 3 wheels & tires just right snug, with no more room to spare! Perfect fit. Wish the opening gap could be closed, but oh well. I just flipped it upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Lieblingsfarbe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a basic tire cover.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to store my Bridgestone Potenzas. They are 275/35/19s and 255/40/19s. For a basic cover to simply shield your tires from sunlight and dust these will work perfectly. If you need to offer some stronger physical protection then you will need to spend more. For my purposes they work perfectly and actually doesn't look all too bad.
customer_reviews.author: B. Widener

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Works great - Medium fits nicely over a set of 235/40 R18 tires, mounted on 8" rims, which are 25.4" in diameter. From the looks of it, I think it'll fit fine over my summer wheels too, which are 245/35 R19's, a tenth of an inch larger in radius. Really dresses up what was an unsightly stack of tires, and it seems to block the rubber smell pretty well too.
customer_reviews.author: macroexp

customer_reviews.title: This cover is good for keeping the tires out of the sunlight
customer_reviews.text: I agree with wrapping tires in plastic wrap to preserve the rubber in the off season. This cover is good for keeping the tires out of the sunlight. It also looks good since the tires are stored in a finished basement. Winter tires are a safe luxury.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Priced fairly
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for durability or quality of material because I haven't bought any before to compare to but it covers the wheels and stops them from getting dirty I guess. That's all I care about
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for my 20" tires
customer_reviews.text: I put the individual tires inside Kurgo 00036 Seasonal Tire Totes and then placed this cover over the tires that are set on a pallet.. My tires are 245/50R20, which are 29.6" in diameter and the cover easily fits over all of them.
customer_reviews.author: ByteTime

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate size, need 2-3 size larger than what you need
customer_reviews.text: The size is wayyyyy off! The medium for 25" barely fit my 19" wheels. The small for 20" didn't fit the 20" or 19" The medium 25" didn't fit my 24" Had to use the medium 25" for my 19" ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing your tires in your house or garage
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 235/40/r18 winter wheels/tires perfectly. I keep them in the garage in a corner and put a black trash bag underneath the stack to help protect the bottom tire. Material is in good shape and doesn't feel flimsy when you are pulling it into position in zipping it up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: ITS NOT THE BEST COVER BUT WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: This cover is pretty thin.. it seems to fit good and is big enough, its just that the fabric looks thin and feels thin. Time will tell how long it takes the sun to destroy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph  Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Used to cover kickboxing bag
customer_reviews.text: My kickboxing bag is outside under a patio roof, but I needed something to cover it from dust and morning dew. This worked surprisingly well. It’s thin, so would only recommend to protect from dust and light water. Good to cover any of your big cylindrical things.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tall Table Cover to hide I'll change items
customer_reviews.text: I saw this item and knew this would be perfect to cover my oil change pans and consolidate everything in one place. It sits on a tall table waterproofs tools, oil, pans, filters etc. It is under a tree by my driveway and concealed but nicely covered. I don't have to go to my tool bins and buildings to find everything spending most of change time setting up. It Is all there and convenient. Wow
customer_reviews.author: WOW!

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Bought cover, dolly and flat tie downs. It all works great..no more trying to put winter/summer tires on shelves..getting too old for that.
customer_reviews.author: raven

customer_reviews.title: Great price, love the zipper, plenty wide and long for my 19 inch wheels and tires
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is a nice feature. This covered my 19 inch wheel and tires easily and they are 255's and the cover is plenty long. Good quality and makes the tires look a little more organized in the garage than just a stack of plastic bags
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It's holding up well and fits as it should Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit for 245/40/18 oem subaru STI wheels and tires.
customer_reviews.author: Senna 68

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to understand the sizing of the product or else it will be to small and not fit over the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection for seasonal tires.
customer_reviews.text: Fit tires a bit larger than listed in description with no problem. Solid materials, easy and solid zipper operation, drawstring bottom closure for extra tight closure. Actually better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: M Bulldawg

customer_reviews.title: Well-made.  Incredible value.
customer_reviews.text: Given the low price, I was expecting something a lot less robust. Very high quality and an amazing value. Would be a decent deal at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: dgc1962

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to cover my stock tires off my suv and this was a perfect fit even has a zipper to make it easier to slip on and off
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off....RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a MEDIUM for Subaru Outback 222/60/17 Bridgestone snow tires and it was way too small. Immediately returned it. The size recommendations are off.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my stack of 4 - 19in wheels with 235/35/19 tires with plenty of room for a larger tire. They have a zipper down the side too.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling L. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: Cover was a perfect addition to keeping the garage looking organized. Stacked the all seasons on a furniture dolly, draped them with this cover and rolled the tires over to a corner to wait for winter to end!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: This isn't for 20" tires.
customer_reviews.text: I have four 17" tires(225 45 17). I thought this will fit because it says fits up to 20" tires. But it was my mistake. diameter was not fit, and height was too short. If you consider to buy this, you should buy large size.
customer_reviews.author: yejung

customer_reviews.title: Protect your rims and tires with ease.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!! Now I can be at ease, nowing my rims and tires are safely covered and protected from the elements..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills its purpose
customer_reviews.text: It fits a set of 4 16" wheels/tires no problem and is a much better solution than wrapping each individually in large plastic garbage bags as I have before purchasing this. This is placed outside under a roof and it seems to do a good job and protecting the wheels from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and I love how these hide ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and I love how these hide and protect tires. It also gives a much cleaner look to my garage. It was a happy surprise to find a small drawstring bag included in this for my lug nuts. Would absolutely recommend getting this but, please, make sure you get the right size and measure your wheels.
customer_reviews.author: hari subramanian

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with it. Nice way to keep tires dry even on a balcony
customer_reviews.author: R. Mehdi

customer_reviews.title: Bought with a vertical stand that keeps my off season ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought with a vertical stand that keeps my off season tires off the ground and separate from each other ... and with the cover in place my garage looks neat and clean ... well neater and cleaner ... just taking care of the tire problem did not fix everything.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit on 18s
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 wheel/tire combo, 18 x 8 wheels with 235-40-18 tires installed. When they're stacked, this thing fits perfectly, The adjustable string at the bottom fits snug and keeps the tire smell out of my basement.
customer_reviews.author: mikeandm

customer_reviews.title: Outside Summer Tires
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but snow accumulates in the center, melts, and the resulting water drags the cover down. I put a piece of cardboard in the center under the cover and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This cover has been great for keeping moisture out of the tires as snow ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in an urban area and store my out of season tires on the deck. This cover has been great for keeping moisture out of the tires as snow falls and melts.
customer_reviews.author: Ramonabeth

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built cover, fits my winter set of wheels and tires perfectly. I store the wheels inside the garage, so this cover will do nicely and works for me. It's fairly thin though; for outdoor storage, I would look for a thicker material.
customer_reviews.author: 1pennyshort

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I need to keep my wheels/tires clean/out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need to keep my wheels/tires clean/out of harms way when storing in my garage. Sizing I will note is on the smaller side, so when in doubt order larger.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Matches well with rolling tire cart.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to store and cover tires vertically. Placed them on a tire cart.
customer_reviews.author: Ray M.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Measure first!
customer_reviews.text: Did it’s job. Quality material. You can tug and pull with confidence. Has a drawstring to close the opening on the bottom to minimize dust or dirt from getting in.
customer_reviews.author: jTrizzle

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect for to store my OEM truck rims which are: 245/60/R18s
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for its okay
customer_reviews.text: it feels cheap, it looks cheap, and it is cheap. so far its been working fine. if your looking for long term tire storage this might not be the one for you
customer_reviews.author: Scuba

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 22's and was easy to use.. 9 inch wide 22" rims/tires fit well underneath. Zipper came in handy and the drawstring at bottom, will help as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Konarski

customer_reviews.title: Bought this a little too small but was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a little too small but was able to stretch it over my tires. Make sure you research to get the right size. I would just get the largest size to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and fits (but be sure to measure your tires!)
customer_reviews.text: It's inexpensive and fits perfectly. Make sure you measure your tires across the diameter before ordering (I did). The size of your tire listed on the side wall is not the same as the diameter needed to order the right size cover. It came fast in an envelope via USPS. I unpacked and covered my stack of 4 tires in about 1 minute. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kalish

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. Quality made. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product to neatly keep tires in any storage area.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tire Storage
customer_reviews.text: This fits my tires and wheels and allows for weather protection as I have to store them outside. Zips down nicely and has a cord tie at the bottom for cinching it down. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Carter

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Definitely does what it came to do and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: TONY NJ

customer_reviews.title: keeps your off-season tires safe from weather and sun.
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i needed for my winter tires in the summer i swap between all seasons and winter tires. this keeps my off-duty set safe from the elements on my balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for tires
customer_reviews.text: Good cover for tires, but before buy check your tire outside size edge-to-edge. First time I made mistake and bought wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: the large size is pretty large. I used it to store my mercedes tire set with 5 275/30/19 tires and it wasnt stretched at all. Also pretty durable, although havent used it in the snow yet but great protection against rain and such.
customer_reviews.author: zuhair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept my wheels in mint condition all winter and now they are going back on the ride thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... in the element for some time will make it easy to tear
customer_reviews.text: Material is very thin and being in the element for some time will make it easy to tear. Handle with care and it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mielbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 19" and 20" wheels great. The largest tire is a 275/35/19 and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 19" and 20" wheels great. The largest tire is a 275/35/19 and it fits with no issues,
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: The material becomes weak and brittle then tears after about a year outside
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mack

customer_reviews.title: I bought the size large which is the smallest available ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size large which is the smallest available for my tires. This fit my tires a little loosely but seemed sufficient. Unfortunately, the wind stripped it off in less than 24 hours and it is no where to be found. I just bought a second one to give it another try. Wish there was some way of securing it apart from tucking the cinched end under the tires.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Grove

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Wasn’t sure they were going to fit my wheels but they did. Must say I’m very pleased with how it’s worked as well as the price! Highly recommended if your storing tires.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover thatnisndirble and priced right
customer_reviews.text: Great item that goes with my tire trolley. Will be getting 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Racer X. Motorsports, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Needed to Buy Extra Large
customer_reviews.text: Figured I give this a shot to cover my summer tires. They are 305/40/22. Large will not cover all 4. Other than that its good
customer_reviews.author: Lori K.

customer_reviews.title: Probably good for the price
customer_reviews.text: They do keep tires dry, but disintegrated in less than a year in the sun. Still, $15. Maybe that's ok. I think I'll try a different brand and compare.
customer_reviews.author: John Clement

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2017 Chevy Silverado stock tires with rims perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for 2017 Chevy Silverado has it out in the sun for a few weeks and still Holding strong .. holds water out also ..
customer_reviews.author: SceneOne4teen

customer_reviews.title: Fit's as described
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently using this product on my 20" 2017 GMC Yukon tires it fits perfectly. I've owned the product for about 3 months now it's showing a bit of wear. But it has been sitting outside in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: It was as described!
customer_reviews.text: Good material, easy to slip over my tiers and the drawstring tucks in the excess material.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great indoors, not so much outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Convenient to use in a garage, but not suited for outdoor use. Very easy to get on and off with the zipper and secure with the draw string. Held up pretty good in the sun, but the wind shredded it within a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has worked very well to keep the tire area ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked very well to keep the tire area from looking cluttered. The polyester cover material is somewhat lightweight, but for what it's asked to do it's ok. It appears to have a light plastic coating on the inside surface. I'd get them again.
customer_reviews.author: Buster Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fit 31" Tire Stack perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet! Took a gamble on the fit (says up to 30" only) but it fit my 31" tire stack like a glove! They're definitely snug, so 31" would be the absolute max.
customer_reviews.author: Matt V.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cover to protect the pile of 4 tires of a Porche Panamera - make it looking nice and clean in the corner of my garage
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Nice product...tight fit on 17"  tire/wheel combo
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage but this size maxed out on a 17" wheel/tire combo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A premium cover for premium wheels and tires! Just excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my summer wheels/tires for the winter and vice versa in the summer. Keeps them nice and clean until they are ready to be put on again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product, works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use, it fits well and will work just as advertised. Really like it! A great bargain for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BDR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice way to get the tires covered in the garage, work perfectly on my 20" rims.
customer_reviews.author: Caine Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great product & price
customer_reviews.text: Great product & price ($17.83). I bought the medium size (up to 25") & it fit my 235/45/17 tires/wheels which are a bit larger than 25" I believe.
customer_reviews.author: W M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: They dress up my tire storage area very nicely. They are durable and appealing to the eye when covering second sets of wheels/tires.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Tenuta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits our tires perfectly and it makes having tires stacked in our garage look very organized and neat!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri McGuire

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a clean and tidy garage
customer_reviews.text: My garage now looks nice and clean. I like the most how it looks and protects. I have nothing bad to say about it 🙂👍

customer_reviews.title: Great fit I actually I fit my 22 inch rims ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit I actually I fit my 22 inch rims with tires
customer_reviews.author: dean rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great fit...
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than expected, but worked good for my stock Impala rims.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be as advertised and it fit all 4 of my tires perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Richard Papasian

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This tire hide helped take my 4 Auto Tires and turn them into a nice stack that keeps the suns UV rays off of them! Will be buying more very shortly!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Covers a stack of tires. Just need something flat ...
customer_reviews.text: Covers a stack of tires. Just need something flat to put over the top if storing it outside. Rain water gets in there otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyMN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to realize this product offers a fair degree of water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: bbc

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't cover the bottom of the bottom tire so ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't cover the bottom of the bottom tire so be aware if you don't want it resting on the concrete floor.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and does its job. Very happy to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Rylie James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: keeps sawdust and dirt off my tires while i store them in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Atkin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase thus far.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Will update later to see how it ages outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: A & S's Dad

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: great. its a nice cover that fits my 21" tires and wheels
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Useful, not exactly high quality material, but I got what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.  Clean

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and big enough for a full set of truck rims and tires
customer_reviews.author: Heavy spender

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover easily covered my stack of four 245/75R16 tires. I would recommend this cover to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: All my Porsche Wheels/Tires fit in this size cover. ...
customer_reviews.text: All my Porsche Wheels/Tires fit in this size cover. The Medium was too small, but the large has plenty of room to cover them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for your tires
customer_reviews.text: definitely a worthy purchase.Reasonably priced and does the trick! My tires and wheels are protected during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits great and i can't wait to see how it performs when snowed on.

product_meta.title: Heininger 5392 Large GarageMate TireHide (Fits up to 30" Tires)
product_meta.description: Size:LargeYou're smart enough to know that your vehicle needs different tires for different types of fun-snow tires for winter, high-performance tires for track days, off-road tires when you're really headed, you know, off-road. But keeping that second (or third) set of tires from cluttering up your man-cave garage when they're not attached to your vehicle? Well, that's the trick. TireHide is designed to quickly and easily slide over a stacked cylinder of four tires, and it does more than just hide your tires. It keeps your tires (and your killer plus-3 chromes) clean, dust-free and protected from errant garage spills like brake fluid, paint thinner or liquids from 12-ounce cans. It helps keep mice from building cozy nests in your Pirellis. And it makes the chore of swapping out your hoops that much easier because they'll be clean and shiny when removed--provided, of course, they were clean and shiny when they went in. Because while TireHide comes in three sizes, is made of heavy-duty 150D polyster and features a drawstring base for a form-fitting fit, it's not, technically, magic. It is, however, the perfect accessory for the well-groomed garage. Available in three sizes: Small: for up to 20-inch tires - Item #5390, Medium: for up to 25-inch tires - Item #5391, Large: for up to 30-inch tires - Item #5392. Sizing tip: Measure your wheels from edge-to-edge, with the measuring tape running through the center axle point. Choose a size equal to, or larger than, your tire diameter.
feature_bullets: Heavy-Duty 150D Polyester cover keeps dust and spills out
Three-quarter zipper allows quick and easy deployment
Includes storage bag for easy storage
Fits tires up to 30" (measure your wheels from outside edge-to-edge)
